content.title: Calvary Kids Home
content.p: Calvary Kids' mission is to reach children and parents, both here at Calvary Chapel Austin and out in the world beyond, with the love of God, through the teaching of His Word and through service to them.
Our mission can be summed up by the acronym K.I.D.S.:

Know our Families!
Introduce them to Christ!
Disciple, Disciple, Disciple!
Send them out to Serve!

Calvary Kids is designed to serve children from ages one month through 5th grade. We have three departments in our Children's Ministry: Nursery (newborn through 2 years old), Preschool (3 - 5 years old), and Elementary (1st - 5th grade). We love children and open our classes to serve them on all service times. Our Sunday class activities includes Bible lessons, worship, crafts, play, felt stories, games and lots of heart felt care from trained teachers and assistants.

On Wednesday evening we have a separate curriculum servicing our Toddler and Preschool Ministries. Our YDC Club meets on Wednesday evening as well, and trains our children in a real fun, active way to live for Christ. They win prizes and earn awards as they learn important Christian values and Biblical truths.
